name: Just - Ice
description:
A story about justice for just ice. The ice blocks of the world were living chill and peaceful lives...

BUT!!!!

Everything changed when global warming disrupted the natural order of things. Now, one lone ice block takes on the challenge and hopes to one day return back to his icy home.

Credits:

Art & Programming: Me

BG Song: High Free Spirits (Instrumental) by Trysail

Colors Used:

  • #A2CECA (Light Blue)
  • #B21010 (Red)
  • #FFB709 (Light Orange)
  • #FFFFFF (White)
  • #000000 (Black)
